text:
Dear Alan, I am so sorry. 
These days I am in very bad conditions, 

ILM internship Not selected
Framestore Not selected
DNEG Not selected
Sega Nor selected
and more is coming 

I am just trying to solve it, But last night I promise myself it's finished.

Now time to move forward. 

Alan, I want ask something.

You know I am doing environment but when I search about job most of them going to list like this

FX
Lighting
Rig
Animation
Composite

there is no environment or very very few.

Why 3D environment is like this? do you think I have to put my focus on comp or concept design ?

please help me :relaxed:
